item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Tuesday, April 15, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:

13. Algebraic Semantics for Machine Knitting (10 points | 1 comment)
14. What the Hell Is a Target Triple? (3 points | no comments)

17. What are you doing this week? (13 points | 19 comments)

22. SSD1306 display drivers and font rendering (7 points | no comments)
23. Deploying TypeScript: recent advances and possible future directions (4 points | no comments)

25. Procedural Foliage Rendering with L-systems and Geometry Instancing (1 points | no comments)
